item.description:
I can fit 12 comfortably and would like to play some smaller player games so I'll set up some extra tables - I have Forbidden Island - Russ, bring Pandemic!, and what's anyone else got? Maybe I should go buy Bang! too; I haven't played that since I last played with Mitch I think :(

Bring snacks to share if you'd like and BYOB if you'd like alcohol

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: Play small group games
